trans-unit.source: Indicates the set of security rules the common language runtime should enforce for an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指示公共语言运行时应为程序集强制实施的安全规则集。

trans-unit.source: This class indicates which set of security rules the common language runtime should enforce for an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此类指示哪一组公共语言运行时应为程序集强制实施的安全规则。

trans-unit.source: For example, an assembly that is marked with `[SecurityRules(SecurityRuleSet.Level1)]` uses the .NET Framework version 2.0 transparency rules, where public security-critical types and members are treated as security-safe-critical outside the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，标记为程序集`[SecurityRules(SecurityRuleSet.Level1)]`使用.NET Framework 版本 2.0 透明度规则，其中公共安全关键类型和成员处理为安全-可靠-关键的程序集外部。

trans-unit.source: This requires security-critical types and members to perform a link demand for full trust to enforce security-critical behavior when they are accessed by external callers.
trans-unit.target: 这要求安全关键类型和成员执行针对完全信任的链接要求，用户访问由外部调用方时强制执行安全关键的行为。

trans-unit.source: Typically, level 1 rules should be used only for compatibility, such as for version 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，第 1 级规则应该用于仅为兼容性，如版本 2.0 程序集。

trans-unit.source: For more information about level 1 behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关第 1 级行为的详细信息，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about level 2 behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关第 2 级行为的信息，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.SecurityRulesAttribute"></xref> class using the specified rule set value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.SecurityRulesAttribute"></xref>类使用指定的规则设置的值。

trans-unit.source: When you specify the `ruleSet` parameter, use <xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet> for .NET Framework version 2.0 rules or <xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet> for [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] rules.
trans-unit.target: 当指定`ruleSet`参数，使用<xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet>.NET Framework 2.0 版规则或<xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet>为[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]规则。</xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet> </xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet> behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet>行为，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet> behavior, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet>行为，请参阅[安全透明的代码，级别 2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Security.SecurityRuleSet>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the transparency rules set.
trans-unit.target: 指定透明度规则的枚举值之一设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rule set to be applied.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the transparency rules to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 指定要应用的透明度规则的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether fully trusted transparent code should skip Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) verification.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否完全受信任的透明代码应跳过 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 验证。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only for optimization, because security guarantees made for transparent code cannot be enforced if the code is unverifiable.
trans-unit.target: 此属性应仅用于优化，，因为无法验证代码时不强制为透明代码进行的安全保证。

trans-unit.source: If you use this property to skip MSIL verification for an assembly, use the `transparent` option in the to statically verify that the assembly's transparent code meets type safety requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性用于跳过的程序集的 MSIL 验证，使用`transparent`选项中以静态方式验证程序集的透明代码是否满足类型安全要求。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if MSIL verification should be skipped; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应跳过 MSIL 验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
